body:
Comment 10: 
sorry, please scratch what i've said in #9. it will cause another clang error message:
src/cmd/gc/obj.c:210:10: error: field 'lit' with variable sized type 'Strlit' (aka
'struct Strlit') not at the end of a struct or class is a GNU extension [-Werror,-Wgnu]

if char s[1] is changed to s[0], then it will cause go_bootstrap link failure:
.string: dwarf: missing type: type.runtime.rtype
go tool dist: FAILED: /Users/minux/work/go/go.hg/pkg/tool/darwin_amd64/6l -o
/Users/minux/work/go/go.hg/pkg/tool/darwin_amd64/go_bootstrap $WORK/_go_.a
